text: Tomalokara pratipalakara anugraha sandhana karaata tomalokara kono papa nahaya. Eteke tomaloke yetiya araaphatara paraa ubhati ahiba tetiya masba'araula haraamara ocarata allahaka smarana karaiba arau te'om tomalokaka yenekai siksa diche thika tenekai tomaloke te'omka smarana karaiba. Yadi'o iyara agata tomaloke bibhraantasakalara antarbhukta achila
